summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2478 for the improvement of Grand Boulevard from Twenty-ninth Avenue West to a point one hundred (100) feet west of Thirty-eighth Avenue West; Thirty-fourth Avenue West Thirty-fifth Avenue West, each from Grand Boulevard to Elmore Street, all in The City of Seattle, by constructing watermains therein or proper dimensions and materials, together with all gates, tees, crosses, and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service of said district; under Ordinance No. 26828, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
